alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Neosho and Allen Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gas, or over Iola, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Iola, Humboldt, Erie, St. Paul, La Harpe, Gas, Moran, Walnut, Galesburg, Savonburg, Elsmore, Stark, Earlton, Mildred, Bassett, Petrolia, Chanute Airport, South Mound and Iola Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
